64f0ad1b2c3d4e5f67890150 description: I have a client in dire need of energy storage. Bring me one 6-STEN-140-M military battery.
64f0ad1b2c3d4e5f67890150 note: Find and hand over 1x 6-STEN-140-M military battery.
64f0ad1b2c3d4e5f67890150 successMessageT: Good. This will keep the lights on.
64f0ad1b2c3d4e5f67890150 failMessageText: Contract expired. We'll source it elsewhere.
